channel.title: Need beginner help with my server [how to make ¨Pk teleport¨ example.PLEASE HELP
channel.description:
yeah title says the most of.. i need help how to change the teleport names and put the new location like¨Home¨ and like then it teleports to Draynor Village (if i want to) and how i put like when u click example Pk Teleport (when u have made it) like there comes a new panel where u can select example , Multi,1v1,FunPk. and how i put more teleports in the server, cuz i have been saw theres teleports in floor and near those are npcs who say example¨SKILLING ARENA!!¨ and how do i delete my npc's/objects if i have already spawn those?
And Last ,but the not least..How do i save my work? cuz after my job i compile my client but thenwhen i woke up next day and come on my server the all npcs are gone.. (they not walking)
PS:How Do i add shops on any npcs? and how do i add items to the shop.. example if i want hans to shop guy how do i give him items and how i put there the shop screen..
[size=18pt]PLEASE HELP NEW RS PRIVATE SERVER MAKER (moparisthebest.com (no downloadle clients)) BY HELPING HIM WITH THOSE ¨BEGINNER¨ THINGS :([/size]
PS: wtf.. my portforwarding doesnt work(i have linksys) i think i have done all correct, but why the heck my homies cant join my server?.. i think its on the runserver thing cuz it says starting yewscape server on 0.0.0.0:43594 (my server is yewscape.no-ip.biz)
[size=16pt]thank you for reading and (helping:))[/size]
PS::HOW DO I ADD OBJECTS?

item.title: Need beginner help with my server [how to make ¨Pk teleport¨ example.PLEASE HELP
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

for the portforwarding problem once you port forward by getting you defual ip and everything you gota add something also to your fire wall. go to your fire wall and click it open it up on top there should be some tabs click expectations. then click add add a name like RsPrivateServer but the port your using and tpc then add run your server should work =S was my problem. for adding objects you must open your client.java and serch makeGlobalObject(3226, 3433, 14860, 0, 10); the first 2 numbers of that code at the x and y location. the 14860 is the object id. the 0 is witch way its facing dont fuck with that. the 10 i still dont know i never change it. changing teleport locatings are in clicking most.java. and chaning names are in text handler. posibley the other way around =S. hope this helps :). next time please post if your using a 317 or w.e and like a delta or w.e

Read full topic
